name: Save For Later Like Amazon
author: Kabeer

sections.description:
Save for Later Plugin , Specifically made for WooCommerce . It’s being Used by millions, Save For Later helps in enhancing the conversion rate on the website . Generating More Sales . Can add your product on a temporary cart for making them purchased at a later stage. To get started: activate the Save For Later plugin.

Major features in “Save for Later” include:

  • Helps in binding customer cart items even after an year
  • Flexibility to customer to add less important items in cart
  • Free to use

Contact Developer info@kbizsoft.com

Powered By Kbizsoft
sections.installation:
Upload the Save For Later plugin to your WooCommerce WordPress Store, Activate it, then under setting > Save For Later you can manage it

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
